title: Ávila
knownFor: Spain's highest provincial capital with the best-preserved medieval walls in Europe. Birthplace of Saint Teresa, with stunning Romanesque and Gothic architecture. UNESCO World Heritage Site.
howToGetThere: Train from Chamartín (1h 30min, 3 times daily) or bus from Moncloa (1h 15min, 5 times daily). Both options work well depending on your schedule.
